Once upon a time, a troubled crane was walking in a meadow. It was feeling very scared and alone. Suddenly, the crane saw something flying up high in the sky and it knew it had to follow. The crane spread its wings and flew higher and higher, and soon it could see a sack in the horizon.
The sack was as big as a mountain, so the crane started to worry about how it would ever reach it. But the crane kept flying and eventually it made it to the sack and rested there.
